## Data exploration

```{r }
data_tidy_mem <- DataTidyGelaDURT::data_tidy_mem %>%
  tibble::as_tibble()

data_mod_mem <- data_tidy_mem %>%
  dplyr::filter(age == "adult") %>% 
  dplyr::select(-age) %>%
  dplyr::left_join(
    data_tidy_clin_adult %>%
      dplyr::select(-c(age_in_years:ppd)), 
    by = "pid"
  ) %>%
  dplyr::rename(days = grp) %>%
  dplyr::mutate(
  days = factor(
    days, 
    levels = as.character(c(0, 21, 35, 365))
  ), 
  pop = factor(pop, 
               levels = c(
                 "cd4",
                 "mait", 
                 "nkt",
                 "gd"
               ))
  ) %>%
  dplyr::mutate(
    day_type = ifelse(days == "0", "pre_bcg", "post_bcg")
  ) %>%
  dplyr::mutate(
    race = factor(race, 
              levels = c("non_black", "black")), 
    sex = factor(
      sex, 
      levels = c("female", "male")
    )
  )
```
